content.rendered:
Directed by Kevin Smith

Written by Kevin Smith

Star Brian O’Halloran(Dante). Jeff Anderson(Randal). Vincent Pereira(Hot Goalie). Mike Zapcic(Hockey Player (as Michael Zapcic)). Bryan Johnson(Hockey Player). Walter Flanagan(Hockey Player / Egg Man). Ming Chen(Hockey Player). Ernest O’Donnell(Hockey Player / Rick Derris (as Ernie O’Donnell)). Michael Belicose(Hockey Player / In a Row Guy). Jason Mewes(Jay). Kevin Smith(Silent Bob). Yassir Lester(RST Customer). Trevor Fehrman(Elias). Gail Stanley(Elias’ Mom). Byron Stanley(Elias’ Dad). Austin Zajur(Blockchain Coltrane). Jordan Monsanto(Cereal Mom). Logan Mewes(Cereal Kid). Kevin O’Donnell(ER Bleeder 1). Amy Sedaris(Doctor Ladenheim). Phallon Adriana(ER Nurse). Justin Long(Shaving Nurse). Rajiv Thapar(Anesthesiologist). Diana Devlin(Waiting Room Lady). Rosario Dawson(Becky). Brian Quinn(Auditioner 1). Sarah Michelle Gellar(Auditioner 2). Fred Armisen(Auditioner 3). Melissa Benoist(Auditioner 4). Danny Trejo(Auditioner 5). James Murray(Auditioner 6). Sal Vulcano(Auditioner 7). Donnell Rawlings(Auditioner 8). Chris Wood(Auditioner 9). Joe Gatto(Auditioner 10). Ben Affleck(Auditioner 11). Ralph Garman(Auditioner 12). Ethan Suplee(Auditioner 13). Scott Mosier(Auditioner 14). Freddie Prinze Jr.(Auditioner 15). Anthony Michael Hall(Auditioner 16). Jake Richardson(Auditioner 17). Grace Smith(Auditioner 18). Bobby Moynihan(Auditioner 19). Marilyn Ghigliotti(Veronica). Nicholas Brown(Car Sex Selfie Snapper). Jennifer Schwalbach Smith(Emma (as Jennifer Schwalbach)). Sara Belicose(In a Row Guy’s Kid). Robert Hawk(Pringles Guy). Joe Bagnole(Cat Customer). Uncle Wayne(Look at This Fucking Guy). Scott Purcell(Door Puller). Betsy Broussard(Dental School Renter (as Betsy Broussard Kurdes)). Virginia Smith(Caged Animal Masturbator (as Virginia Sheridan)). Frances Cresci(Smoking Girl). John Willyung(Cohee ‘Killer’ Lundin (as John Willyung Jr.)). Donna Jeanne(Ruse Lady (as Donna Jeanne Bagnole)). Thomas Burke(Thomas the Roofer). Thomas Burke Jr.(Son of Thomas the Roofer). Scott Schiaffo(Chewlies Gum Rep). Kimberly Gharbi(Heather Jones). Christian Cordes(True Believer). Kate Micucci(Mooby). Derek Berry(Mooby Manager). Nate Gonzales(Mooby’s Minion). AnnaMarie Brown(Little Lisa). Michelle Buteau(Little Lisa’s Mom). Marc Bernardin(Little Lisa’s Dad). Liz Priestley(Night Nurse). Anthony Perry(Doctor Mayor (as Mayor Anthony Perry)). Mike Vezza(ER Bleeder 2 (as Michael Vezza)). Shane Kalman(Priest). Harley Quinn Smith(Milly). Nicholas Joseph Binckes(Frustrated Customer). Joseph Digennaro(Frustrated Customer). James McDonald(Frustrated Customer). Cindy Sue Miller(Frustrated Customer). Micah Miller Greenburg(Frustrated Customer). Shannon Scheffling(Frustrated Customer). Jeremy Wein(Frustrated Customer). Bethany Aline(Hospital Staff). Julian Babel(Hospital Staff). Malcolm Baldwin(Hospital Staff). Christine Weiss Beidel(Hospital Staff (as Christine Beidel)). Tara Berson(Hospital Staff). Zhavier Bonds(Hospital Staff). Kimberly Carter(Hospital Staff). Helen Chong(Hospital Staff). Gregory Chwatko(Hospital Staff). Frank Citara(Hospital Staff). Christopher Cullen(Hospital Staff). Claire Davis(Hospital Staff). Diamandi Devereaux(Hospital Staff (as Diamandi Devereaux Roots)). Carol Driscoll(Hospital Staff). Susan Evans(Hospital Staff). Dave Ferrier(Hospital Staff (as David Ferrier)). Latisha M Hall(Hospital Staff (as Latisha Hall)). Denise Fowler(Hospital Staff). Lisa Hampton(Hospital Staff). Thomas Harding(Hospital Staff). Kaylin Harper(Hospital Staff)

Language English

Producers Jeff Anderson. Chelsey Cole. Liz Destro. David Gendron. Matthew Helderman. Amy Jarvela. Ali Jazayeri. Daniel McGilvray. Jordan Monsanto. Ernest O’Donnell. Brian O’Halloran. Jennifer Schwalbach Smith. Luke Taylor

Production View Askew Productions. BondIt Media Capital. Destro Films
